name: Farm Flow
description:
Hi everyone!

This game is about planting crop and harvesting them. The twist is that you are restricted on what actions you can perform at certain times.

The game includes a description in the beginning, so you will be introduced in all important aspects.

P.S. I had a crazy weekend, I actually don’t know how I finished this game. Since I only spent 20 hours on the development at max, I would expect that the game has some bugs, or unintended behaviour at times.

All art (sorry in advance, my artistic skills are basically zero), sound effects and gameplay was made by me and me only.
